name: Pocket Kitten
description:
Just a chill cozy top-down 2D pixel art pet sim sandbox! Click to play. No keyboard required. Remember that the kitten is easily distracted and will just do what it wants... just like real-life kittens 😆

Play on desktop browser or download for Mac or Windows.

This was made over three days for Ludwig Jam 2023. One of the cats in the game is Coots-inspired 💕

I'd love to add more soon! More items, colors, saving... Let me know what else you'd like.

---

Credits:

I created the art and code, and used Godot.

Public domain audio from Freesound users pivou, seth_makes_sounds, szegvari, mcroce, missozzy, and ienba.

Free font "Perfect DOS VGA 437" by Zeh Fernando.
